Teams brings everything together in a shared workspace where you can find all the important information at one second, chat, meet, share files, and work with business apps.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please download Microsoft Teams on your desktop & your mentor will add you to all the teams we use every day.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Skype is also used as one of the source of telecommunication applications which allows sharing different kind of information within Global Service Desk Team. Following our experience, it is highly recommended to create a new Skype account for business purposes only.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As for now, create a Skype account and share your Skype ID with your mentor who will add you into team's chats. Note that the best way to be easily found in any systems is to keep your user name the same as in UPSA.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Although Skype is used by EPAM employees, it is not supported by EPAM services as it is not an official communication tool within the company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
